pages.text: Once you've tamed your corgi you can make them lay down by simply right clicking them. But you can also make them run around the area they're in by shift + right clicking them, you know it's working when the little pyramid hovers the corgi when you're looking at it. When this is active they won't follow you around.

pages.title: Patrol
pages.text: When the little pyramid is hovering the corgi when you're looking at it, it's in patrol mode.
